themes: need for a dedicated department to promote Austin artists
importance of sustainable infrastructure for the arts
effective allocation of funding and efforts
key_phrases: glad to see that the city and its creative advocates are still striving
find the right way to channel efforts and funding into more effective programs
more front and infrastructure work to have a department that is concentrated on promoting Austin Artists
most impactful and sustainable future-proofing effort
keep Austin a vibrant creative community as it grows
put a boat in the water and ride the current of growth
barriers_identified: lack of a department concentrated on promoting Austin Artists
solutions_proposed: create a department that is concentrated on promoting Austin Artists
